de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation
Class HiveEntrance

java.lang.Object
  de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.AbstractMovingAgent
      de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.HiveEntrance
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIterationAgent, IMovingAgent, IVisualAgent, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
public class HiveEntrance
extends AbstractMovingAgent

This class simulates the entrance of a hive. This class will attach itself to the provided hive. Its superclass is AbstractMovingAgent which performs in the simulation step step(SimState) (nothing).

Changes:

  • 20090901: This class inherits directly from AbstractMovingAgent because the visualization for this object is defined in the MASON specific part of the simulation.

Copyright 2009 Joerg Hoehne

Author:
hoehne (Jörg Höhne)

Constructor Detail

HiveEntrance

public HiveEntrance(ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation simulation,
                    boolean is3dMode,
                    Hive hive,
                    double direction)
The constructor for an hive entrance. This constructor calls the constructor of the superclass by providing the entrance's color.

Parameters:
simulation - The simulation where this entrance resides in.
hive - The hive this entrance belongs to.
direction - The direction in degrees where the entrance is located at the outer rim of the hive.
Method Detail

step

public void step(sim.engine.SimState state)
This method is performed when the next step for the agent is computed. This agent does nothing, so nothing is inside the body of the method.

Parameters:
state - The SimState environment.
